decision_conditions: The proposed development by reason of its scale and layout is considered to constitute over development and likely to result in the substandard provision of external amenity space which would result in detrimentally substandard living conditions for prospective occupiers contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework, policies 3.5, 6.9, 7.1, 7.3, 7.6, 7.14, 7.15 of the London Plan 2011 policies 1.1 (g), 1.2 (h), 3.1(b) and 3.8 of the Ealing's Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and ELV policies 3.5, 7.3, 7A, 7B, 7D of the Ealing's Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | The extension by virtue of its design and materials results in poor quality desing which fails to complement the existing building or the chracter of the area contrary to policies 1.1 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2011) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
